title: Sizzling hot! Watch the motion poster of 'Hate Story 3'
text:
The motion poster of the erotic thriller 'Hate Story 3' featuring Zareen Khan, Karan Singh Grover, Sharman Joshi and Daisy Shah is out! If the 22-second motion poster is anything to go by, the film promises to be bolder than the previous two installments.
Watch the motion poster of 'Hate Story 3' 

Also read:  Zareen Khan smooches with a swollen mouth! 
Recently, the buzz from the set of the thriller was that some intimate scenes between Zareen Khan and Sharman Joshi involved licking chocolate from each othersâ€™ faces. (Read the full story)   Zareen and Karan, too, have done some dare-to-bare scenes for the film.
Produced by Bhushan Kumar's T-series, 'Hate Story 3' has been directed by Vishal Pandya, who had also helmed 'Hate Story 2'.
Also read:  Zareen Khan, Daisy Shah get in shape for bold scenes in 'Hate Story 3' 
'Hate Story' released in 2012 and starred Nikhil Dwivedi, Gulshan Devaiah and Paoli Dam in lead roles. The second part starring Sushant Singh, Surveen Chawla and Jay Bhanushali hit theatres last year.
